content: I assure you that I am not a bird and that I am a language model, a computer program that has been trained on a large dataset of text. I don't have the ability to lie, as I do not possess consciousness or intention. My purpose is to assist users by providing responses based on the information that I have been trained on. If you have any concern about your mental health, please seek help from a mental health professional. They will be able to help you determine the cause of your symptoms and provide you with appropriate treatment.
